MMR/Ranked System ((reliability of) match making), Punishment system (modernised, updating tribunal system with comprehensive options of reporting a player, report of a Honour 5 tribunal member would trigger a message directed to a Riot Support employee to review the report sheet (format) to ban sb. faster and more effectively -> providing utility for Honour 5 players), Promotion games should be re-instituted for only Diamond+ (every tier from Emerald 1 100LP to D1 100 LP), negative LP gain issue should be solved, if ranked restricted you should play to WIN 5 games instead of playing just 5 games, rank 1 or/and top 10 rank players should receive money (potential review to become a pro player), punish jungle ganks more (e.g.: team jungler should be able to punish the enemy jungler by leaving one kurg or one wolf alive so it doesn't reset, junglers should get way less XP and Gold from minions), support roams should be punished if they fail (e.g.: sup item is tied to the bot lane partner, so if they roam and either die or non-bot laner in proximity dies, they should be punished with a timer of less XP/Gold, sup damage should be nerfed across the board but their shields, heals and cc should be buffed (let ADC do the damage during laning and sup should do mosquito bites)), make ADCs XP gain different than from any other role by potentially buffing it but still make it gain slightly less than mid jungle top (sup should maintain current xp sharing disadv without any changes)

1: Make new champions not be overpowered on release every. god. damn. time. 2: Remove invulnerability from assassins and pantheon. Bard ult and zhonia is plenty and comes with a payoff. We dont need panth who can tower dive 1v5 and survive with 100% hp. 3: nerf assassins in general. 4: Make ap scaling higher again (or nerf AD amount that AD champs can obtain). When AD champs could only reach about 50-70% of what AP champs could the scaling was OP but now that AD champs can get more AD than AP champs can get AP it just makes AP feel useless. 5: Stop nerfing orange essence/making rp more expensive/nerfing mythical essence value.
